The series is back and I am so happy.

This game is fantastic, nothing else needs to be said. If you haven't played it, do it.

Even though it released in 2004 this game's story and graphics still hold up today in 2019. The gameplay is fun but can get a bit mundane with little else to do, that's normal with these kind of FPS games. The later Episodes feature more involved physics puzzles that really show off the physics system. If you don't have it already you should pick it up now.

played this on the 360 with the orange box. a few years later. i've  made the full jump to pc to play this, the portal  series, and tf 2 to their fullest potential. the half life 2 games are a stuff of legends.  this series is personal to my heart and hearing the news of a new half life game. im full of joy!  So, if you havent played half life 1 or 2.  Do it now. LIKE RIGHT NOW.  (unless you got better taste. i respect that.)  9/10, a total game changer.
